Description: Build beautiful, engaging, and conversational online forms, surveys, quizzes, landing pages, and much more with Typeform.
Name: Typeform

Methods.Name: List Forms
Methods.Description: Get a list of all your typeforms.

Methods.Name: List Webhooks
Methods.Description: Retrieve all webhooks for the specified typeform.

Methods.Name: Form Submission
Methods.Description: Get new form submissions as soon as they are entered. To map your answers create a custom field with the prefix "form_response.answers." or use auto discovery.

MetaTile: Typeform Integration - Form & Feedback Automation - Cyclr
MetaDescription: Integrate your Typeform forms into your business systems, so you can make the most of your data.
